issue.title: [C++] Add boost/process library to build support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8771](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8771). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of our test source code requires the process.hpp file (and its dependent libraries). Our current build support does not include these files, causing build failures like:

fatal error: boost/process.hpp: No such file or directory
